title: nambinEn aiyyaa
sahitya:
nambinEn ayyA naTarAjA unnai nAyanmArgaLukkum tAyanaya tOzhA



anupallavi



vempiNi tuyar veyya vEdanaiyAl vembiDAdennuyir nambanEyaruLvAi



caraNam



paTTadellAm pOdum paramanE ini nAn padi jnAnattuDanE tudi pADiyunnai

oTTi vAzha varuL iTTa deivamE urugum sadAnandan gurumaNiyE pOTri
